revisionDesc.change: moved notes to external notes file and added pts
Duke proofreading corrections; date note update
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Added date annotation and proofreading corrections, updated notes. Re-dated letter to February 23, 1869; revise Steers, Pierepont and Devlin annotation to match new date.
Correct date in title, update annotations
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.note: Brooklyn–25 Feb 1868 to attorney general's office wash.
body.p: i got your letter all safe to day wensday Wednesday it was rather late but it come yesterday was a tremendous rain the water has been a foot deep in the cellar they say the rats has undermined it but it has dried away some its it's a low place the water settles in the yard it is better george sold it they are much pleased with it say they wouldent wouldn't take 1000 dols dollars for their bargain

mrs Steers gets along very well with her bakery) we have had mrs Black here she has just gone and quite a releif relief it is too
she come she said to tell me of a sure cure for the rheumatis i asked her what it was she said put a potato in each pocket and wear them in your pocket till they are hard and the rheumatis will i supos suppose go in the potato
she asked me when she went away if i would doodo it i told her i would carry half a dozen if they would do me any good

well walt i am glad you are bettr better of your distress in your head very many people is
complaining of colds well the president cant can't pardon very many more rouges rogues you know i suppose Devlin is pardoned the papers say peirpont Pierrepont is to be the attorney genrallgeneral but i suppose you will know soon

i hear from Jeff and mat once in a while Jeff has or has had great anxiety about the works the river rises so much higher than usual that there is fear of the overflowing of their works poo poor Jeff i expect he is in
lots of trouble but as we understood Davis it wouldent wouldn't doodo such an amount of damage if it did overflow but Jeff is so nervous)
walter dear if you can as well as not i wish you would send me the draft next week) George had to make a payment the other day and had to take all he had to make it out)
give my love to the oconors O'Connors and love to yourself)
